document.docAuthor: Borowiec, Lech, Świętojańska, Jolanta & Sekerka, Lukáš
document.masterDocTitle: Revision of the tribe Cryptonychini (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae) of New Caledonia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: Revision of the tribe Cryptonychini (Coleoptera: Chrysomelidae: Cassidinae) of New Caledonia

paragraph.materialsCitation:
Type locality.
New Caledonia ,
Foret de Thy
,
550 m a.s.l.

caption.paragraph:
FIGURES 163–171.
Teretrispa
gahniae
Gressitt
, 1960
. 163–164. Body dorsal, 165. Antenna, 166. Frontoclypeus and prosternum, 167. Head dorsal, 168. Pronotum, 169. Fore leg, 170. Mid leg, 171. Holotype labels.

subSubSection.paragraph: Sexual dimorphism moderately manifested, in males interantennal process more flattened laterally than in females, mid tibiae apically armed with longer spine than in females, apex of last ventrite in males deeply and broadly emarginate while shallowly emarginate in females.
Immature stages. Larva was described by Gressitt (1960b: 119) .

Host plants. Cyperaceae :
Gahnia
sp. nr.
G. vitiensis Rendle
,
Scleria
sp. ( Gressitt, 1960b ). According to the label data specimens were also collected from endemic bamboo
Greslania
sp. ( Poaceae ).

♂ , ‘ NEW CALEDONIA |
Foret de Thy
|
550m
,
III-6
-’60 [w, p, cb] || J. L. Gressitt | Collector [w, p, cb] || D127 [yellow, typed, s] ||
HOLOTYPE | TERETRISP [hw] | GAHNIAE [hw] | J.L. Gressitt [r, p, cb] || TERETRISPA [hw] | GAHNIAE [hw] | GR. [hw] | J.L.Gressitt [p]’60[hw] [w, p, cb]’ ( BPBM )
.
Paratypes :
1 ♂ , the same data as holotype but ‘D142 [yellow, typed, s] ||
ALLOTYPE | TERETRISPA [hw] | GAHNIAE [hw] | J.L. Gressitt [r, p, cb]’ ( BPBM ); 1 ♂ , first two labels as in holotype but ‘3601 [w, hw, cb] ||
Paratype | TERETRISPA [hw] | GAHNIAE [hw] |
Paratype | J.L. GRESSITT [hw] [orange, p, cb]’ ( BPBM )
.
